title: I Touch Myself

constellations_other.name: Jan Chapman
constellations_other.description: From an independent Sydney cinema to the world's stage, Jan Chapman's work has many connections to the Australian film scene and Hollywood.

description: The Divnyls’ hit single ‘I Touch Myself’ launched the band’s popularity into the stratosphere, with the single reaching #4 on the US Billboard Hot 100 and number one in Australia. The music video was directed by blockbuster and explosions aficionado Michael Bay and was nominated for three MTV Video Music Awards, including Video of the Year.
description_for_label: The Divnyls’ hit single ‘I Touch Myself’ launched the band’s popularity into the stratosphere, with the single reaching #4 on the US Billboard Hot 100 and number one in Australia.
